banner.text:
=> Meteor 1.1.0.2: official Windows support, new package version constraint solver.


   This release is being downloaded in the background. Update your app to
   Meteor 1.1.0.2 by running 'meteor update'.

=> Meteor 1.1.0.2: fixes a client-side Blaze crash regression in 1.1.


   This release is being downloaded in the background. Update your app to
   Meteor 1.1.0.2 by running 'meteor update'.

=> Meteor 1.1.0.2: fixes a Linux `meteor mongo` regression in 1.1.0.1.


   This release is being downloaded in the background. Update your app to
   Meteor 1.1.0.2 by running 'meteor update'.
